Articles.Content:
I would like to congratulate Squad, Private Selection and 2K on a much better privacy policy this time around. 

The EULA still needs work.

I recommend explicitly allowing court legal appeals to the arbitration clause if the arbitration method and judgement are found to be unfair due to fault of the other party. 

I would also have some sort of handling of class action cases, instead of of handling cases one by one when mistakes happened.   Mistakes do happen to the best of us, and dealing with those who were affected can get very costly, very fast for all sides, especially for 2K, the parent company. Another company was recently hit with this and their arbitration clause that did not permit class action cases almost drove them bankrupt.

Edited January 4, 2020 by Ruedii
